Data: 2.12 pm: Australia have won the toss and chosen to bat.
Shami to Warner, no run Warner walks at him, he delivers a bumper and Warner ducks
Shami to Warner, no run back of a length, on off, he's back and defending to cover-point but the fielder closes in to prevent one
Shami to Warner, FOUR runs cut beautifully forward of point! Fractionally short and wide, the pitch is a lovely pace, he leaned back and placed it nicely forward of point
Shami to Warner, no run 135kph, back of a length, angled in, he's cramped jumping back to defend
Shami to Warner, no run 136kph, good length angled in, he gets half forward and gets a thick inside edge onto pad. Shami appealed but Warner clearly hit it
Shami to Warner, no run 142kph fuller and wider, Warner leans onto a square drive and times it beautifully, but straight to point
Bumrah to Finch, no run 141kph, good length, angled into off, he leans forward and pushes firmly to mid off
Bumrah to Finch, no run 140kph, back of a length, on off, he's back and working to forward square
Bumrah to Finch, no run 135kph back of a length, outside off, he's back and defending to cover
Bumrah to Finch, no run good length, angled in, he is jumping back and defending from the crease
Bumrah to Finch, no run 144kph, full outside off, he drives firmly to mid off
Bumrah to Finch, no run back of a length, off stump, he's back and defending to point
Shami to Warner, 2 runs 138kph, shorter into the hip, he's back and tucking this forward of square with just a push but times it well enough to get two
Shami to Warner, 2 runs 140kph short ball, surprises Warner in terms of bounce, he pulls awkwardly and gets a thick top edge that flies safely over square leg
Shami to Warner, no run 141kph, good length, top of off, he defends from the crease
Shami to Warner, 1 run 138kph, fuller, he flashes a drive and gets a thick edge that flies safely well wide of slip down to third man
Shami to Finch, no run good length, fourth stump, he walks down and defends to mid off
Shami to Finch, 1 run 139kph, angled down leg, he glances to fine leg to get off the mark
Bumrah to Finch, 1 leg bye 146kph, back of a length, into the thigh pad, he tried to pull but it comes off the thigh guard and they get a leg bye
Bumrah to Warner, 1 run 141kph, full on leg, he works this off the pads to midwicket and they pinch a quick single
Bumrah to Finch, no run 141kph, back of a length, fourth stump line, he pushes on the front foot to cover
Bumrah to Finch, 2 runs chipped just over midwicket! It was mistimed off a slight leading edge, Kohli was tight at midwicket and it just went over his head for a couple
Bumrah to Finch, FOUR runs thumped off the pads behind square! Didn't chip this. Too full and straight and Finch glanced it powerfully behind square
Bumrah to Finch, no run 142kph, back of a length outside off, he's back and cutting to point
Saini to Warner, SIX runs pulled over square leg! A drag down short ball first up, Warner waits back and picks this up easily, depositing it over the rope with a controlled pull shot
Saini to Warner, no run swing and a miss. 139kph, fuller length, he tried to launch down the ground but it swung away late to beat the edge
Saini to Warner, 1 run 142kph, good length, angled into off, he's back and working this behind square to the sweeper in the deep
Saini to Finch, no run 141kph, he tries to drive on the up wide of off, gets a thick edge to short fine
Saini to Finch, 1 run 144kph, good length outside off, he walks down and defends with soft hands to cover-point and they pinch one
Saini to Warner, 1 run 143kph, back of a length on leg, he's back and turning this around the corner to fine leg
Shami to Warner, no run 136kph, good length, angled into off, he defends to cover
Shami to Warner, no run 139kph, short ball, he tries to pull but it holds in the surface a touch, he mistimes a pull off the toe to midwicket
Shami to Warner, no run 139kph, good length angled to the top of off, he defends half forward
Shami to Warner, no run 140kph, good length, fourth stump line, he pushes on the front foot firmly to cover-point
Shami to Warner, 1 run 139kph, back of a length, fourth stump line, he's back and pushing this into the gap at point
Shami to Finch, 1 run 141kph, full on off, he slices a pushed drive to mid off and takes on Kohli! What running! Very brave. Kohli was in quickly and the throw was sharp but Finch beat him
Saini to Finch, 1 run 139kph, full outside off, Finch sets himself back and just drives with his hands wide of mid off
Saini to Warner, no run 141kph, good length, angled into middle, he defends from the crease
Saini to Warner, FOUR runs lofted straight of mid off! It was a full delivery floated up outside off, he swings through the line, doesn't nail but hits it well enough to find the rope
Saini to Warner, 2 runs 141kph, bouncer, he pulls as he moved his head out of the way and slaps it forward of square and they run brilliantly for two

Saini to Warner, FOUR runs What a shot! Backing away and smashes this past cover! It was good length angled into the top of middle, he backed away and slapped it between cover and mid off. This pitch is very good to bat on
Saini to Warner, 1 wide bouncer high over Warner's head and called wide
Saini to Warner, no run 142kph, shorter length, he's back and running this with control to short third man
Shami to Finch, no run back of a length, nipping in, he's walking forward and getting hit on the thigh pad, it rolls to short third man
Shami to Finch, 1 run good length, 141kph, top of middle, he tucks this around the corner to fine leg
Shami to Warner, no run 139kph, good length angled into off, he defends on the front foot
Shami to Warner, no run 140kph, back of a length on off, he's back and working this to midwicket
Shami to Warner, FOUR runs brilliant pull shot wide of mid on! Fractionally short, angled in, Warner stands up and plays a short arm jab, thumping it wide of mid on
Shami to Warner, FOUR runs short and wide and cut up and over point! They just brought deep point up in the circle and then he dragged it wide, Warner was sitting and waiting and lifted it over point
Bumrah to Finch, no run back of a length outside off, he's back and defending to cover
Bumrah to Finch, 1 wide 140kph, bouncer, very high. Finch doesn't need to duck and it was a tough take for Rahul. Called wide
Bumrah to Finch, 1 run back of a length, 141kph, on off, he's back and working this to midwicket, Kohli misfields as they pinch one
Bumrah to Warner, no run 143kph, full on off, he checks his stroke, defending to mid off
Bumrah to Warner, no run 138kph, bouncer, over leg, he ducks under it
Bumrah to Warner, no run 145kph, back of a length on middle, he's back and defending to midwicket, Warner quickly sends Finch back. He was ready to go but Pandya zipped in
Bumrah to Warner, no run 143kph, angled in, straightening, Warner gets a slight leading edge but it flies safely into the off side
Saini to Finch, FOUR runs Finch charges and lifts over wide mid off! 141kph, length ball wide of off, but finch's movement turned it into a volley and he lifted it over wide mid off with ease
Saini to Finch, no run 147kph, good length on middle, he hangs back this time and drives firmly to mid on
Saini to Finch, no run just short of Jadeja at backward point! 143kph, short and fractionally wide. Finch cuts but it's tight to him and he slices it in the air but it just bounces short of Jadeja
Saini to Finch, 1 run back of a length angled in, he tries to turn behind square but gets a thick inside edge onto thigh pad and it rolls into the off side for one
Saini to Warner, no run 144kp, cracking yorker, fourth stump line, Warner is beaten and it goes past off stump! Not far away. Great delivery
Saini to Warner, 2 runs short and wide, 144kph, he cuts in the air through a vacant backward point, the sweeper has to get around to cut it off
Chahal to Finch, 1 run full on middle, he drives to long on
Chahal to Warner, SIX runs slog sweep into the midwicket crowd! Wow. Leg break, tossed up in the slot, he got down on one knee and took no notice of the man at deep midwicket, he hit in 15 rows back!
Chahal to Warner, FOUR runs short and wide, over-compensation, Warner slaps a cut through cover-point! Easy pickings
Chahal to Warner, no run 87kph, good leg break on off, Warner mistimes a drive to Chahal
Chahal to Warner, 1 run 87kph, angled into leg stump, he clips this off his toes. 50 to Warner off just 39 balls. He has been superb so far.
Chahal to Finch, no run drifting into leg, it slides on and hits the pad, there's a polite appeal but no conviction. It was sliding down and India knew it
Saini to Warner, no run fuller on off, he pushes a drive back to Saini
Saini to Warner, 1 run 142kph, back of a length outside off, he's back and late cutting, controlling the bounce to third man, Warner pushed for two but slipped
Saini to Finch, no run yorker length outside off, he squeezes this out to point
Saini to Finch, no run 144kph, good length, on off, he pushes this from the crease to mid off
Saini to Finch, (no ball) 146kph, high full toss hits him in the stomach! Finch doubles over in pain. But he's OK.It's a no-ball
Saini to Finch, no run Finch swings hard backing away at a shorter length ball but misses by a mile
Saini to Finch, FOUR runs good bouncer but Finch gets a top edge trying to hook and it flies safely fine of fine leg! A bit unlucky for Saini
Chahal to Warner, 1 run shorter leg break, he's down low and pulling to square leg
Chahal to Finch, no run 88kph, slider out of the front of the hand, Finch stays leg side to drive but mistimes and drags to midwicket
Chahal to Finch, 1 run good length, 90kph, he skips down and drives to long on
Chahal to Warner, 1 run shorter length, he's back and punching to long on
Chahal to Finch, no run 92kph, fuller and quicker outside off, he charges but has to jump outside off to get his pad in the way to block it
Chahal to Finch, 1 run full on leg, he clips this firmly through forward square to the sweeper
Bumrah to Finch, 1 run 144kph, back of a length on off, he's back and defending this to cover-point for a single
Bumrah to Warner, 1 run 141kph, short ball into the ribs, he tried to avoid it and got hit on the gloves, taking his eyes off it, it rolls behind square
Bumrah to Finch, FOUR runs short ball, Finch pulls powerfully with the angle behind square and beats fine leg! He did takes his eyes off it but nailed it
Bumrah to Finch, 2 runs chipped just over Kohli at cover! This wasn't in control but he lifted a backfoot drive over cover
Bumrah to Finch, FOUR runs half volley, 145kph, he set his firm and caressed a glorious cover drive! Beautiful shot
Bumrah to Finch, no run 142kph, back of a length on off, Finch is back and defending

Chahal to Warner, no run Warner might be run out here due to a horror mix up! He just got home! So close. He pushed to cover and called yes but was rightly sent back, the throw was right over the bails and Rahul whipped them off quickly but Warner's full length dive got him home by inches
Chahal to Warner, 1 run slower leg break, he's back and working this off the pads to deep square
Chahal to Finch, no run shorter outside off, 91kph, he punches off the back foot to cover but he mistimed it
Chahal to Finch, 1 run 89kph, good length on leg, he sits back and works this to the gap square of midwicket
Chahal to Warner, no run tossed up, he drives straight to cover
Chahal to Warner, no run 88kph, pushed through, he defends with the full face into the on side
Jadeja to Finch, no run 93kph. tossed up on middle, he drives back to the bowler
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run drifting into leg, he paddle sweeps fine but didn't get it well
Jadeja to Warner, no run tossed up on middle, he pushes back to the bowler
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run floated up on leg, he chips this in the air towards long on but short of the man
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run shorter length, 94kph, he stands up and punches to long on
Jadeja to Warner, 3 runs fuller outside off, he sits back though and punches this on the up past cover and they will get a couple
Chahal to Warner, no run shorter on leg, he's back and tucking this to midwicket
Chahal to Warner, 1 run full outside off, he drives to long off, Warner wants two but it's not on
Chahal to Finch, 1 run flatter quicker one, on middle, he drives to long on

Chahal to Warner, SIX runs lofted just over long on's head! Powerful shot. It was tossed up, he skipped down and launched it flat but got enough of it to beat the man on the rope who jumped up. It was too high for him
Chahal to Warner, no run flatter on middle, he's back and working to midwicket
Chahal to Warner, no run yorker on middle, he jams it
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run length on off, and a misfield at cover means they get an extra run. Kohli the fielder
Jadeja to Warner, no run length on off, pushed to short cover
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run reverse sweep, but doesn't get hold of it. Short third man fields easily
Jadeja to Finch, no run skips down the track and gets to the pitch to flick it off his pads but can't beat midwicket
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run angling into him, makes room and cuts through point staying legside of the ball
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run fullish on the pads, flicked to short fine leg
Chahal to Warner, 1 run fullish and spinning into him, tucked through square
Chahal to Finch, no run down the track but this was bowled flatter and quicker, and shorter, so he can't quite get to the pitch. Bunts it back down the pitch
Chahal to Finch, no run and down the track again, gets to the pitch that time but the ball's dipping a bit on him and he can't time his drive. Toe ends it to the ground and then to extra cover
Chahal to Finch, 1 run stays in his crease this time and clips it comfortably to long-on
Chahal to Warner, no run length ball spinning into him, punched back, not timed
Chahal to Warner, no run flatter and quicker outside off, pushed back to the bowler's left
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run floated up on a length outside off, slapped to deep cover
Jadeja to Warner, no run marginally shorter, Warner goes back to pull but gets it towards the end of his bat and mistimes it to mid-off
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run goes for the reverse sweep because it's full on leg, but doesn't get it cleanly. Ball loops up off glove behind the keeper
Jadeja to Finch, no run worked to short fine leg
Jadeja to Finch, no run a few steps down the track and flicks off his pads again, but again straight to short fine
Jadeja to Finch, no run good length, tight line outside off, nudged to backward point
Chahal to Warner, 1 run fuller outside off, driven to long-on
Chahal to Finch, 1 run tossed up, he skips down the track and punches to long-off
Chahal to Warner, FOUR runs nicely done by Warner. Too full and straying on the pads, Warner sweeps it fine with full control. He had to beat short fine leg, and did it easily
Chahal to Warner, 1 run length on the stumps, clipped to long-on
Chahal to Finch, no run full-blooded drive to a tossed up full ball outside off, but hit straight to Kohli at short cover
Chahal to Finch, SIX runs boom. That's vintage Finch and a great way to raise his fifty. Tossed up too full outside off, he gets down on one knee and slams it over deep midwicket
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run length on leg stump, nudged away through square
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run fuller on the stumps, pushed to wide long-on
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run length on the stumps, pushed gently to long-on
Jadeja to Finch, 2 runs fuller on the pads, worked through backward square leg
Jadeja to Finch, no run darted on leg, he misses the flick
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run looked to launch that over long-on but doesn't time it that well and it bounces to the man on the boundary there
Shami to Finch, no run good length outside off, punched towards extra cover
Shami to Finch, FOUR runs smacked. That is superbly done by Finch. Marginally short by Shami, and he transfers weight back and pivots to nail this pull shot to deep midwicket
Shami to Finch, 2 runs came on to him a bit quicker, Finch was looking to swivel-pull again, gets it finer than he intended, but the fine leg is squarer so they get two
Shami to Finch, no run length outside off, steered to backward point

Shami to Finch, OUT caught at extra cover. Good bowling by Shami, he was brought back for the breakthrough and gets it. Full ball tailing into him, it's a yorker almost and Finch is off balance while trying to flick it off his toes. Gets a leading edge that loops up for an easy catch
Shami to Smith, no run yorker first up on leg stump, Smith's moving across, nudges it to square leg
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run length on the stumps, punched to long-on
Jadeja to Smith, no run steps down the track and defends this into the offside
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run given some more air this time, Smith stays in his crease and strokes it through point
Jadeja to Warner, no run looped up on the stumps, pushed to short midwicket
Jadeja to Warner, no run flatter on leg stump, nudged to midwicket again
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run flatter and shorter, he goes back and works this backward of square
Shami to Warner, 1 run back of a length angling into him on off, steered to short third man's right, who does well to dive and stop it
Shami to Smith, 1 run too full and on the pads, flicked to deep square leg
Shami to Warner, 1 run banged in short, he stays in his crease to pull, didn't really go properly back on that so it goes off the top edge, but lands safely, well clear of deep square leg
Shami to Smith, FOUR runs class from Smith. Was going for the yorker but it's not quite there, and Smith moves back and across to drive this bullet straight, back past the bowler
Shami to Smith, 1 run length on off, stays still at the point of contact and works it through square
Shami to Warner, no run fuller on a fourth stump line angling into him from around the wicket, driven hard into the ground and straight to short cover
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run length outside off, Smith stretches his front foot forward and pushes with his bat in front to long-off
Jadeja to Warner, 1 run length, stump to stump, goes across and clips this through square leg

Jadeja to Smith, 1 run, OUT Warner might be run out here. He pushed hard for two, it was his call, and he made the dive too, but the man at long-off scored a superb direct hit. And he's out. That's a bit of luck, there was no need to push for that second. Shreyas Iyer the fielder, who's done rea
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run length on the stumps, goes back and pushes through square
Jadeja to Labuschagne, no run fuller on the pads, worked to short fine leg
Jadeja to Labuschagne, no run length outside off, gently pushed to short cover
Bumrah to Smith, FOUR runs shot!. Loosener from Bumrah, wide and short, and Smith stays still and punches through point by opening his bat face. The ball fairly raced off the bat, such great timing
Bumrah to Smith, 1 run clipped through midwicket
Bumrah to Labuschagne, no run length ball nipping into him with the angle, patted back to the bowler
Bumrah to Labuschagne, 1 run length on a fifth stump, steered to third man
Bumrah to Smith, no run length outside off, defended towards point
Bumrah to Smith, 1 run fuller on off, he's moving across so ends up picking this off his pads through square leg
Jadeja to Smith, 2 runs goes on the front foot and works it through square. Soft hands and no fielder there so they can sprint back for two
Jadeja to Smith, no run fuller on off, uses wrists to try to drive this to the bowler's left but Jadeja dives and stops it
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run goes back and whips this through midwicket
Jadeja to Labuschagne, 1 run length on middle and leg, flicked off the back foot to deep midwicket
Jadeja to Smith, no run extra bounce. On a length and he was a bit surprised by the bounce, had to loosen wrists and let the ball plop back on the ground off the high part of the bat, defending it
Jadeja to Smith, no run length on the stumps, worked to midwicket
Bumrah to Labuschagne, 1 run nipping into him a tad, back of a length, punched through cover
Bumrah to Smith, no run fuller outside off, comes on the front foot and steers to point
Bumrah to Smith, 1 run back of a length, keeps it close to off, Smith stays beside it and opens the face to run it to third man
Bumrah to Labuschagne, 1 run length outside off, he's pushing inside the line and it takes the edge to go to third man. The fielder is a bit square so has to run to his left to gather
Bumrah to Smith, 1 run length outside off, moving across and flicks to deep square
Bumrah to Labuschagne, 1 run goes for the yorker, but it's a low full toss, bunted to mid-on for a quick single
Jadeja to Labuschagne, 1 run fuller on the stumps, comes on the front foot to work to midwicket

Jadeja to Smith, FOUR runs outstanding by Smith. Made a hint of room to a full ball on off, and threaded the gap through cover beautifully. Timed it superbly too, as it runs all the way to the boundary

Jadeja to Smith, 1 run risky run. Not the best idea after a run out already. This was pushed to cover and they set off, Marnus had to put in a full -length dive. Might have still been tight with a direct hit, but the fielder was rushing in and let the ball go while horizontal
Jadeja to Labuschagne, 1 run steered through square

Jadeja to Smith, SIX runs bang. Spots the length so early does Smith. Fuller and he takes a big stride, goes down on one knee and unleashes a slog sweep to perfection. Ball goes several rows back over midwicket
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run straight bat to long-on for a single to retain strike
Saini to Smith, no run back of a length outside off, punched to point
Saini to Smith, 1 run back of a length outside off, cuts it to deep point
Saini to Labuschagne, no run attempted yorker turned low full toss, driven back past the bowler off the outside half of the bat. Mid on fields
Saini to Labuschagne, 1 run length on the stumps, uses wrists to flick this backward of square

Saini to Smith, FOUR runs elegance. Smith is in some unbelievable form. Full on off, he's moving across but is always so still at the point of contact, drives this very straight, to the bowler's right and it races to the boundary
Saini to Smith, FOUR runs and now touch to follow class. Moving across again, this ends up on his pads and he flicks this fine. Fine enough that no fielder can get there. He's found his hands alright
Jadeja to Labuschagne, 1 run length on the stumps, makes room to punch through cover
Jadeja to Smith, no run floated up outside off, stroked to point
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run flatter and shorter and quicker, stays back and punches to long-on
Jadeja to Labuschagne, 1 run down the track and clips this through square leg
Jadeja to Smith, 2 runs fuller, given some air, driven inside out through cover
Jadeja to Smith, 1 run flatter darting into him, punched easily to long-on
Chahal to Smith, 1 run flatter on a length, he's coming down the track, gets to the pitch and pushes it through midwicket
Chahal to Labuschagne, 2 runs tossed up outside off, goes down and sweeps it hard through midwicket
Chahal to Labuschagne, 1 run length outside off, stays back and cuts this through point
Chahal to Smith, 1 run length on off, stays legside of it and punches through cover
Chahal to Labuschagne, 1 run flatter outside off and shorter, he was going down early to sweep, has to wait for it and just paddles it to short fine leg's right
Chahal to Smith, no run punched to cover
Saini to Labuschagne, FOUR runs 142kph, half-volley and he climbs into a glorious cover drive! Just smashed it past cover's left
Saini to Labuschagne, 2 runs full and angled into middle, he pings this off his toes through square midwicket, lovely timing for two
Saini to Labuschagne, 1 run 141kph, good length, some width, he thrashes a square drive on the up to deep point
Saini to Smith, 1 run 141kph, back of a length, fourth stump line, he sits back and guides this to third man
Saini to Labuschagne, 1 run 143kph, back of a length on off, he's back and whipping this with the bottom hand through square leg
Saini to Smith, 1 wide 138kph, bouncer, bounces slowly wide of off and the square leg umpire calls wide on height. Might have been a bit stiff. It was tight
Saini to Smith, 1 run 139kph, short into the ribs, he steps inside and pulls to fine leg. 50 off 38 balls for Smith. He has motored to that half-century.
Agarwal to Smith, 1 run tossed up on middle, he drives to long off
Agarwal to Labuschagne, no run 97kph, he steps outside leg early, Agarwal follows, he paddles this fine
Agarwal to Labuschagne, 1 run low full toss, driven to long on
Agarwal to Smith, no run 95kph, flatter on middle, he turns this to midwicket

Agarwal to Smith, FOUR runs a misfield at point gives up four! Jadeja with the error. It was short outside leg, Smith backed away and slapped it to backward point, it should have been stopped but Jadeja didn't get his hands low enough
Agarwal to Smith, FOUR runs lofted straight back over the bowler's head! Lovely shot. Didn't over hit it, just timed it and placed it and the outfield did the rest
Hardik to Labuschagne, no run short slower ball, 118kph, he tried to pull but it gripped and beat him for a lack of pace
Hardik to Labuschagne, 1 run 131kph back of a length on off, he's back and tucking this behind square
Hardik to Smith, 1 run 121kph, slower ball cutter, full outside off, he pushes this gently to the cover-point gap
Hardik to Labuschagne, no run 117kph, slower ball, good length, he defends into the on side but sends Smith back
Hardik to Labuschagne, 2 runs 131kph, fuller outside off, he whips this wide of long on and immediately calls two. Excellent running
Hardik to Labuschagne, 1 run 120kph, slower ball banged in, he stands up and smacks a pull straight to deep midwicket
Chahal to Labuschagne, no run 86kph, tossed up outside off, he tries to sweep but misses
Chahal to Labuschagne, no run quicker and flatter on middle, he's back and tucking this around the corner
Chahal to Labuschagne, 2 runs advances to drive and gets a thick inside edge past leg! It runs away for two
Chahal to Labuschagne, FOUR runs powerful sweep forward of square! Leg break on middle, he got down early and placed this forward of square. He struck it well to find the gap
Chahal to Labuschagne, 1 run full on off, he drives to long off

Chahal to Smith, FOUR runs top edged sweep goes behind square and half volleys into the rope! He didn't intent to get that in the air, he rolled the wrists on the sweep to get it safely behind square and it nearly went for six!
Hardik to Labuschagne, 2 runs slower ball, he slices this high over cover and just got enough of it to clear the fielder running back
Hardik to Labuschagne, 1 run 118kph slower ball wide of off, he reaches out and wristily turns this through square leg
Hardik to Smith, no run short and wide, he cuts firmly but straight to backward point. Smith is annoyed at himself for not finding the gap
Hardik to Smith, 1 run 107kph, slower ball, he late cuts but can't beat Dhawan diving at backward point
Hardik to Labuschagne, no run Labuschagne sets up way outside leg, Hardik fires wide, Labuschagne reaches out and slaps it back to the bowler
Hardik to Labuschagne, no run 117kph, slower ball bouncer, he tries to pull but misses
Shami to Smith, FOUR runs thumping cover drive! Half volley wide of off, Smith opened his chest and hammered it between cover and mid off and the fielders did not move as it rocketed past them
Shami to Smith, no run 124kph, slower ball bouncer, Smith tried to lap scoop! He set up too early and it lobbed over his head
Shami to Smith, 1 wide slower ball, 121kph, but too wide of off and called wide
Shami to Smith, 1 run 142kph, back of a length wide of off, he's back and gliding this to third man
Shami to Labuschagne, 1 run full outside off, he square drives to deep point
Shami to Smith, FOUR runs threaded past cover again! Another full delivery on middle, he backed away and carved it between cover and mid off once more. Incredible batting
Shami to Smith, 1 run 121kph, short wide slower ball, he hammers a cut, Jadeja makes a diving stop on the ring
Bumrah to Smith, FOUR runs 118kph, slower ball and he square drives on the up through backward point!Staggering timing on the up and he placed it past the backward point and beat the sweeper
Bumrah to Smith, FOUR runs delicate late cut fine of short third man! Another slower ball wide of off, he sat back and just let it run off the face to find third man with the man inside the circle
Bumrah to Smith, no run 142kph, good length, top of off, he defends
Bumrah to Smith, no run 142kph, fuller length on off, he mistimes a drive to cover

Bumrah to Smith, FOUR runs glanced past short fine from outside off! Good length delivery on a fourth stump line, he waiting and using the wrists tucked it wide of short fine and it raced away to the rope
Bumrah to Smith, 1 run 124kph, slower ball, he slog sweeps behind square to the man in the deep
Chahal to Smith, 2 runs 88kph, leg break, he advances and drills a drive to straight long on and Labuschagne hares back for two
Chahal to Smith, SIX runs launched straight to the sightscreen! He danced out and thumped this gun-barrel straight and it hit the sightscreen hard
Chahal to Smith, 2 runs shorter length, he's back and tucking this to the circle at midwicket and they run brilliantly to pinch two
Chahal to Smith, 1 run 90kph, shorter length, he pushes this to wide long on and they push for two, Labuschagne slips at the striker's end and they call no
Chahal to Labuschagne, 1 run wide full toss, he advances and slaps a drive to deep cover
Chahal to Smith, 1 run lopped up on leg, he drives to long on and Smith makes back-to-back centuries! Again off 62 balls. What an innings. He gets a standing ovation. That's his 11th in ODI cricket
Hardik to Smith, FOUR runs he steps outside off and lap scoops while doing an army roll! Amazing shot to get it over short fine

Hardik to Smith, OUT edged and caught at short third man! This was a wide slower ball, he fell over trying to cut it, got a thick edge and it flew straight to short third man on the circle. Smith is furious but he gets a hug ovation as he walks off
Hardik to Maxwell, no run hit in the helmet! Slower ball bouncer, it stops in the surface, he gets through the pull shot and it hits the right side of the helmet. He's OK.
Hardik to Maxwell, 1 run slower ball, 110kph, wide of off, he whips to deep midwicket
Hardik to Labuschagne, 2 runs 112kph, slower ball, he tries to work through the leg side, he gets a leading edge that flies through backward point for two
Hardik to Labuschagne, 1 run 134kph, full toss, he punches a drive down the ground
Jadeja to Labuschagne, 1 run 97kph, darted in, he skips out and drives on the up to long off
Jadeja to Maxwell, 1 run Maxwell sets up way outside leg, Jadeja delivers on middle, he whips this to deep forward square
Jadeja to Labuschagne, no run 99kph, fired outside off, he tries to sweep fine but gets hit on the pad well outside the line
Jadeja to Labuschagne, 1 run tossed up he drives firmly to cover the fielder does well to make a rolling save
Jadeja to Maxwell, FOUR runs rank round arm fired down leg and Maxwell steps inside and pulls over short fine! He would be frustrated he didn't hit that for six

Jadeja to Maxwell, FOUR runs switch hit flies fine of short third man! This was quick outside off, he switched his feet to go over backward point, but didn't get that much bat on it, it runs away fine of short third man
Hardik to Labuschagne, 2 runs Jadeja drops a sitter at long off! This was lofted straight to him, he cruised in and at waist high just spilled it, they get two
Hardik to Labuschagne, FOUR runs wide slower ball, he late cuts superbly through the gap past short third man! 50 for Labuschagne from 46 balls.
Hardik to Labuschagne, no run 104kph, wide slower ball, he shuffles outside off to cut but misses. It bounced slowly off the surface
Hardik to Labuschagne, 1 run slower ball, 108kph, short, he mistimes a pull to deep midwicket
Hardik to Maxwell, no run 116kph, slower ball outside off, he tries to switch hit but gets hit on the pad outside off
Hardik to Maxwell, no run slower ball, 119kph, this kicks off a length and Maxwell can't judge the pull shot. He got through it early
Bumrah to Labuschagne, 1 run 123kph, slower ball, short outside off, he mistimes a pull to long on

Bumrah to Maxwell, 2 runs Maxwell should have been run out! Jadeja misses a direct hit. Maxwell hit it to him at cover and ran and gave up, he would have been miles out if Jadeja hit, no one was backing up in the ring so they get an overthrow
Bumrah to Maxwell, 2 runs 120kph, short slower ball, he backs away and slaps it awkwardly through cover-point for a couple
Bumrah to Maxwell, 2 runs 142kph, full half volley, he slices a drive with amazing timing through cover for two
Bumrah to Maxwell, 1 run full wide yorker, he slices this out to cover-point again

Bumrah to Labuschagne, FOUR runs 142kph, almost a yorker he someone squeezes this out behind point taking one hand off the bat at it runs away for four! This outfield is rapid. That was a good delivery
Shami to Maxwell, 1 run slower ball wide of off, he cuts firmly to deep point
Shami to Labuschagne, 1 run slower ball, 120kph, outside off, he late cuts but straight to short third man
Shami to Maxwell, SIX runs huge pull shot over square leg! 20 rows back! Short ball but chest high, he set himself early and with those fast hands thumped it way back
Shami to Maxwell, 3 runs 125kph, full and very wide, he reaches out and slices this very high over backward point but it holds in the wind and lands inside the rope. They run three
Shami to Labuschagne, 1 run 141kph, low full toss, he opens up and slices a drive to deep point
Shami to Maxwell, 1 run 142kph, thigh high full toss, he pulls this behind square but doesn't time it
Bumrah to Maxwell, SIX runs lasered over cover! It hits the fence on the full! What a shot. Slower ball wide and he throws the hands at it and nails it flat over cover.
Bumrah to Maxwell, 1 run 139kph, short ball, he tries to pull but mistimes it through midwicket for one
Bumrah to Labuschagne, 1 leg bye 144kph, yorker outside off, he tries to scoop, gets hit on the pad outside the line and they run a leg bye
Bumrah to Maxwell, 1 run 145kph, cracking yorker, on middle, he could do nothing but dig it out to cover
Bumrah to Labuschagne, 2 runs low full toss, 142kph, he backs away and slices it past backward point, they get a comfortable two
Bumrah to Labuschagne, 1 run 144kph, low full toss, he mistimes a heave to midwicket
Shami to Labuschagne, 1 run 140kph, yorker outside off, he sits back and works this to deep midwicket
Shami to Maxwell, 2 runs 142kph, full outside off, he drills this hard to long off and calls two immediately, Jadeja is off balance and they get back easily
Shami to Maxwell, 1 run slower ball outside off, he mistimes a pull to deep midwicket
Shami to Labuschagne, 1 run low full toss, he gets outside off and gets an inside edge onto pad
Shami to Maxwell, FOUR runs 124kph, slower ball, he reverse sweeps Shami up and over short third man! Outrageous shot
Shami to Maxwell, FOUR runs he goes again with a reverse lap scoop! Insane! Fuller and quicker, he just turned the bat and ramped it up and over short third man again
Bumrah to Labuschagne, 2 runs 141kph, full angled down leg, he backs away and clips this off this pads to deep midwicket for an easy two
Bumrah to Labuschagne, FOUR runs brilliant conventional paddle! It was a good yorker, Labuschagne moved late and just got enough bat on it to paddle it fine of short fine leg
Bumrah to Labuschagne, 1 run low full toss, he backs away and drives wide of mid off but can't beat the man
Bumrah to Maxwell, 1 run 145kph, full toss, he shimmies outside off and glances this fine but straight to fine leg

Bumrah to Labuschagne, OUT caught at mid off! He picks out the man this time. It was a half volley in the slot, he tried to loft over mid off but nailed it flat and Agarwal takes the catch easily on the circle
Bumrah to Henriques, 2 runs 142kph, full outside off, he punches a drive past cover for two to ensure Maxwell has the strike for the last over

Saini to Maxwell, no run Given caught behind! Maxwell reviews. It was full and straight, he tried to reverse lap scoop again and it looks like it just brushed the pad on the way through to Rahul! No hot spot on the bat. He missed it. The decision is overturned

Saini to Maxwell, 2 runs missed at short third man! 50 for Maxwell off 25 balls. He sliced a top edge high to short third man, Shami backed back but got in a tangle and didn't get a hand on it. They run two

Saini to Maxwell, SIX runs low full toss smacked just over Pandya at deep midwicket! Incredible power. It was close to a yorker but not quite and Maxwell taxed him with the bottom hand whipping it over midwicket
Saini to Maxwell, SIX runs high full toss swatted into the Members! Like a baseballer at the plate, he got a delivery knee high and flushed over deep midwicket again
Saini to Maxwell, no run short and wide, he tries to uppercut but misses
Saini to Maxwell, 1 run full on leg, he backs away to have over midwicket but mistimes it to midwicket and they only get one
Elsewhere, India's top athletes, who've traveled for tournaments since the coronavirus pandemic arrived, have their own unique stories to tell. Read more here.
Saurabh will be back soon for the start of the chase.

They will need something similar from the skipper tonight to chase this down. India were 22 minutes over in bowling their 50 overs. But they were 37 minutes over in game one and only got fined for being one over down.

Innings break Australia post 389 just days after scoring 374. All of Australia's top five posted half-centuries for just the second time in ODI history and Smith made another magnificent 104 off just 64 balls. Although in a good omen for India, they won the last time Australia did that with Virat Kohli
- Due to covid. Since we can't have Elite Panel umpires for all games
Cummins to Kohli, FOUR runs glorious straight drive. Full on the stumps, leans forward and drives it straight back
Cummins to Kohli, no run length outside off, opens the face to glide to point
Cummins to Kohli, FOUR runs outside edge goes for four. In the channel and moving in, Kohli is stuck on the crease and plays inside the line, gets the edge but gets runs for it
Cummins to Kohli, no run
Cummins to Kohli, 1 run back of a length, goes for the pull, ball didn't bounce as much goes to square leg off the bottom half of the bat
Cummins to Iyer, no run length ball on off, Iyer hanging back a touch again, but deals with it comfortably enough, patting it to mid-on
Zampa to Kohli, no run tossed up outside off, goes for the big drive but gets it on the bottom half of the bat and the ball rolls to cover
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run good length, comes on the front foot to get to the pitch and steers it through point
Zampa to Iyer, no run fuller, comes on the front foot to drive to cover
Zampa to Iyer, 1 run flatter on off, stays back and punches through cover
Zampa to Kohli, no run length outside off, stays legside of it and opens the bat face to steer, but can't beat short third man
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run too full, clipped off his toes through midwicket
Henriques to Kohli, 1 run 108kph, slower ball, back of a length, he stands up and punches to long on
Henriques to Iyer, 1 run 127kph, length ball wide of off, he square drives to deep point
Henriques to Kohli, 1 run 123kph, back of a length, he advances and mistimes a drive to mid off who is on the circle
Henriques to Iyer, 1 wide 122kph, bouncer sails way over the head of Iyer and is called wide
Henriques to Iyer, 1 run 113kph, slower ball, back of a length, he stands up and punches to long on
Henriques to Kohli, 1 run 123kph, short ball, he pulls powerfully but straight to deep midwicket
Henriques to Iyer, 1 run 120kph, short ball, he stood up and hammered a pull shot and Cummins makes an excellent stop at midwicket to save three runs
Maxwell to Iyer, 1 run tossed up, he sits back and works to midwicket
Maxwell to Kohli, no run tossed up, he dances down but gets a slight leading edge back to the bowler
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run darted into leg, he clips this to deep midwicket
Maxwell to Iyer, no run round arm, flatter, 88kph, he sits back and punches back to Maxwell
Maxwell to Iyer, 1 run 89kph, angled into leg stump, he works this off his hip to deep backward square
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run 87kph, drifting across, he charges and works this with the spin to long on
Henriques to Kohli, 1 run 124kph, half volley, he smokes a drive to cover but the fielder is able to knock it down
Henriques to Iyer, 1 run full on leg, he clips firmly to long on
Henriques to Kohli, no run 126kph, shorter and wider, he backs away to cut but misses
Henriques to Kohli, no run 126kph, good length, fourth stump, he drives on the up to mid off
Henriques to Kohli, 1 run 123kph, full outside off, he square drives to deep cover-point
Henriques to Iyer, 1 run 127kph, low full toss, mistimed to long on
Maxwell to Iyer, 1 run 91kph, shorter length, he stands tall and punches to long on
Maxwell to Kohli, 2 runs drifting across Kohli, he's on the move trying to work to leg but gets a leading edge that runs wide of long on for two
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run shorter length, he's back and punching to long off
Maxwell to Iyer, FOUR runs switch hit over point! Good shot. Smart option. No one back at point, he got the delivery he wanted outside off stump, switched his feet and smacked it over point
Maxwell to Iyer, 1 run shorter length he stands up and drives of the back foot to long on
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run short again, he is back and pulling firmly to deep midwicket
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run tossed up, 91kph, on off, he defends, angling it to the gap at cover-point
Zampa to Iyer, 1 run tossed up outside off, he drives firmly to deep cover-point
Zampa to Kohli, no run top spinner pushed through, Kohli exposes his stumps and chops it to point
Zampa to Kohli, 2 runs 92kph leg break, he advances and drills a drive straight of long on and Cummins has to work hard to get to it
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run drifting into leg, he skips out and whips this firmly to deep midwicket
Zampa to Iyer, no run 96kph, quicker leg break, good length, he's back and working this to midwicket
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run tossed up on leg, he skips down and drives to long on
Maxwell to Iyer, 1 run flatter round arm, he drives on the up to deep long on
Maxwell to Kohli, FOUR runs pulled with ease to the gap at square leg! Fractionally short, Kohli was back in a flash and smashing this into the gap between deep backward square and deep midwicket
Maxwell to Kohli, no run flatter and shorter outside off, he clatters a cut straight to cover
Maxwell to Kohli, 2 runs arm ball, he sits back and late dabs this to third man. Delicate, skilful shot for two
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run shorter length, he's back and smacking this back at the bowler, Maxwell gets a hand down but they take a run on the ricochet
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run tossed up outside off, he advances and drives to deep cover
Zampa to Iyer, FOUR runs thumped over midwicket and wide of long on! Raw power. It was very full on leg, he flicked his hands through and hit it flat and hard over the man in close in the circle
Zampa to Iyer, 1 run top spinner on middle, he's back and working this behind square
Zampa to Kohli, FOUR runs short down leg, he pulls this past short fine to bring up a half-century! He's done that easy. He's starting to accelerate now Virat Kohli
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run 91kph, tossed up outside off, he skips down and drives to long off
Zampa to Iyer, 1 wide 92kph, short wide leg break and it's called wide
Zampa to Iyer, 1 run 96kph, flatter and quicker on middle, he drives on the up to long on

Henriques to Iyer, OUT brilliant catch by Smith at midwicket! Henriques gets a wicket on return. This was a short slower ball, it stopped in the pitch, Iyer had sit and wait, he whacked a pull shot hard to midwicket, Smith was alert diving full stretch on the circle to his right pulled in a beau
Henriques to Rahul, no run 122kph, back of a length outside off, he is back and forcing this straight to cover
Henriques to Rahul, 1 run 123kph, back of a length, fifth stump, he plays an elegant square drive off the back foot to deep point
Henriques to Kohli, no run 126kph, fuller, tailing into middle, he drives towards long on but Smith whips across from midwicket to cut off the single
Henriques to Kohli, 1 run Kohli advances and drives a 111kph slower ball to long on
Henriques to Rahul, 1 run 120kph, angled into the hip, he glances this neatly to fine leg
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run 84kph, tossed up outside off, he eases a drive to deep cover-point
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run tossed up outside off, 86kph, he reaches out and drives to long off
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run 88kph, looped wide of off, he square drives to deep cover-point
Zampa to Kohli, no run 93kph, shorter leg break, he's giving room but forces this straight to cover
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run 88kph leg break, he drives firmly to long off
Zampa to Rahul, no run quicker top spinner, 94kph, he's hurried, pushing back to the bowler
Henriques to Kohli, 1 run 112kph slower ball outside off, he advances and stays leg side, driving to deep cover
Henriques to Rahul, no run 124kph, angled into leg, he pushes this to midwicket and wants one but is rightly sent back
Henriques to Rahul, 1 run 124kph, fuller, tailing into middle, he pushes on the front foot straight of mid on
Henriques to Kohli, 1 run 124kph, half volley, he crushes a drive straight to deep cover-point
Henriques to Rahul, no run 123kph, good length, top of middle, he works this straight to midwicket
Henriques to Rahul, no run 125kph, speared full into middle, he clips this off his toes nicely but Smith makes a fabulous save at midwicket
Starc to Kohli, SIX runs flicked over fine leg into the crowd! Half volley outside leg, Kohli just picked it up with exquisite timing and it went 10 rows back at fine leg
Starc to Kohli, 1 run 140kph, full on leg, he works this with ease forward of square to the sweeper
Starc to Rahul, 1 run 139kph, fuller outside off, he drives off a thick outside edge slicing it with the angle through backward point
Starc to Kohli, no run 135kph, good length, top of off, he pushes this firmly to cover
Starc to Kohli, 1 run 129kph, slower ball, angled across the right-hander, he guides this with the angle to third man

Starc to Rahul, FOUR runs cracking cut shot through cover-point! Short and wide, Rahul was sitting back and he thumped a cut shot forward of point. The sweeper was well behind but it wouldn't have mattered if he was infront!
Henriques to Kohli, FOUR runs pulled in the air just wide of fine leg! Short over leg, he got inside it and helped it on its way, Cummins was closing from fine leg but it was wide of him. Well placed
Henriques to Kohli, no run length slower ball, he charges and gets cramped, taken on the pad
Henriques to Kohli, no run 115kph slower ball, back of a length, he mistimes a pull to midwicket
Henriques to Kohli, 1 run Kohli advances, 114kph, back of a length, he drives on the up to long on
Henriques to Rahul, 1 run 126kph, back of a length on off, he gives room and cuts firmly to deep point
Henriques to Kohli, no run 126kph full outside off, he pushes firmly to cover
Starc to Rahul, no run 142kph, fuller on off, he drives firmly to cover
Starc to Rahul, 1 run 140kph, half volley wide of off, he square drives firmly to deep point
Starc to Kohli, no run 140kph, angled into middle, he clips this beautifully off his pads but can't beat midwicket
Starc to Kohli, no run 131kph, cutter banged in, he's back and guiding this to backward point but can't beat Kohli
Starc to Kohli, 1 run 126kph, slower ball outside off, he sits back and runs this off the face to third man
Starc to Rahul, 1 run 143kph, full outside off, he square drives to deep point
Henriques to Rahul, no run 120kph, short ball, he tries to pull and mistimes to midwicket, it nearly carried to Smith who is tight saving one
Henriques to Rahul, no run 112kph slower ball, off cutter, he gets an inside edge onto pad, it rolls into the off side and Henriques zips across to stop the single
Henriques to Rahul, no run 125kph, good length, on middle, he tries to drive to long on but can't beat Smith at midwicket
Henriques to Rahul, 1 run 123kph, shorter on leg, he pulls with easer to fine leg
Henriques to Kohli, no run short ball, Kohli charges and pulls to midwicket, Smith again makes an excellent save at midwicket to save one
Henriques to Kohli, no run 128kph, length ball, he drives on the up to cover
Starc to Rahul, no run short and wide, he's back and cutting firmly but straight to backward point
Starc to Rahul, no run 130kph, slower ball, good length wide of off, he tries to square drive but misses
Starc to Rahul, no run 137kph, bouncer, well directed, he sways underneath it
Starc to Rahul, 2 runs wide full toss, he square drives through backward point, Labuschagne has a long chase from deep point and makes a good save
Starc to Rahul, 1 run short and wide, he cracks a cut to deep point
Starc to Kohli, FOUR runs sliced past backward point! Full and wide, Kohli opened the face and sliced it just past Smith at backward point and it raced away
Henriques to Rahul, 1 run 107kph, short slower ball, he tries to pull but mistimes backward of square
Henriques to Kohli, 1 run 131kph, back of a length, Kohli advances and drives on the up to long on
Henriques to Rahul, SIX runs What a pull shot! Banged in short and Rahul nails this way back over square leg. It hit the concourse behind the lower level seats
Henriques to Rahul, 1 run back of a length, it skids low, he pulls with control behind square
Henriques to Kohli, 1 run 112kph, back of a length on leg, he gives room to push this into point
Henriques to Rahul, no run 107kph, good length outside off, he mistimes to cover
Hazlewood to Kohli, 3 runs 129kph, full on leg, he chips this high in the air over midwicket, Finch has a long chase from the circle but he does well to save one run
Hazlewood to Rahul, FOUR runs length ball gets punished over midwicket! He didn't nail it. It wasn't that short but off the front foot he pulled it high over midwicket and it bounces into the rope
Hazlewood to Rahul, FOUR runs cracked wide of third man! Too much width at 137kph, he thrashes the hands through it and it races away
Hazlewood to Rahul, no run slower ball, 127kph, it takes Rahul on the pad as he tries to work behind square, there's an appeal for lbw but it is way too high
Hazlewood to Rahul, no run 140kph, back of a length, top of off, he defends from the crease
Hazlewood to Rahul, no run 133kph, leg cutter on off, he mistimes a drive back to the bowler
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run tossed up on a fifth stump line, he was giving himself a bit of room to slap this through cover, but can't time it and it trickles back past the bowler
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run tossed up on off, driven firmly from the crease through cover
Zampa to Kohli, FOUR runs imperious. A couple of steps down, a bit of room and he blasts this over extra cover and into the boundary. Just looks so dominant when he plays that
Zampa to Kohli, no run flatter and pulls the length back so Kohli stepping out can't quite get to the pitch, ends up pushing it to cover
Zampa to Kohli, no run googly, goes back and punches to mid-on
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run shorter and flatter, stays back and punches to long-on
Hazlewood to Kohli, 1 run down the track again, and this is short and wide, he slashes it through point
Hazlewood to Rahul, 1 run length on a fourth stump line, opens the face to drive through cover point
Hazlewood to Kohli, 1 run short ball on the stumps, doesn't bounce sharply, he swivels and pulls from rib height to deep square leg
Hazlewood to Rahul, 1 run big appeal for lbw, not given. Finch indicates height might be a problem and he's right. It jagged in and struck him on the thigh pad, he was looking to pull

Hazlewood to Kohli, OUT Super catch by Henriques at midwicket. Kohli got out in a similar manner in the first ODI and Hazlewood has provided a huge breakthrough. Back of a length, Kohli unleashes a pull while advancing, timed much better than he had in the first ODI, but Henriques at midwicket d
Hazlewood to Hardik, no run bouncer first up goes over his left shoulder as he tries to pull and misses
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run tossed up on off, drives from the crease to deep cover
Zampa to Hardik, 1 run flatter, keeps it outside off on a length, chopped to deep cover
Zampa to Rahul, no run fuller, driven to extra cover
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run nicely tossed up, dipping on him as it reaches him, patted into the offside for a quick single
Zampa to Hardik, no run flat and quick, he gets behind it and defends back down the pitch
Zampa to Hardik, 1 run tossed up wider outside off, comes on the front foot to drive to deep cover
Hazlewood to Hardik, no run punched to midwicket
Hazlewood to Hardik, no run back of a length on a seventh stump line, he tries to cut this but can't connect

Hazlewood to Hardik, 1 run was moving across but Hazlewood kept it well outside off and Hardik cramped for room to this back of length ball. Ends up half-edging, half-guiding it to third man. Bounced more than he expected, had to play it near his ribs
Hazlewood to Rahul, 1 run low full toss on off, one hand comes off the bat as he drives to deep point with an open bat face
Hazlewood to Hardik, no run short ball, he was expecting it perhaps, moved across and threw everything into a pull shot, but can't connect. Goes over his left shoulder

Hazlewood to Hardik, SIX runs Pandya power. That's not such a bad ball but when he nails his shots, there's no stopping them. A touch too short and he swats it across the line - goes flat and hard, all the way over deep midwicket
Starc to Rahul, no run angling into him on a length, pushed back down the pitch
Starc to Rahul, no run full angling in on middle stump, steered to short third man. Smith's there and he dives to his left to stop the ball. He's unstoppable today is Smith
Starc to Rahul, no run yorker on middle and off, mis-times his drive to mid-off
Starc to Rahul, SIX runs boom. Moves across to get inside the line to this short ball and pulls fiercely, sends it several rows back over deep square leg
Starc to Rahul, no run back of a length outside off, steers to backward point. He's angry with himself, perhaps thinks he should have put that away better
Starc to Rahul, 1 run fuller on the stumps, driven to deep cover
Cummins to Rahul, no run back of a length outside off, mis-times his pull to mid-on

Cummins to Rahul, 2 runs chips over mid-off. Went inside out to this fuller one and well clear of mid-off, but not enough legs on it to stop Finch running back and pulling the ball in well before it reaches the fence
Cummins to Rahul, 1 run moves across and tries to smack a pull shot to the boundary but doesn't get the timing or placement quite right. Bounces down to deep midwicket
Cummins to Hardik, 1 run was moving across but the bowler keeps it on his front pad and Hardik can only nudge it away for a single
Cummins to Rahul, no run tried to ramp this but it was a slower bouncer outside off and he had to adjust to it, ends up getting such a soft touch it bounces before the keeper
Cummins to Rahul, SIX runs bad ball and put away in style. brings up fifty for Rahul. Too short, sat up, Rahul rocked back and pulled this high and handsome over deep midwicket
Starc to Hardik, 1 run bouncer down leg, he pulls it to fine leg
Starc to Rahul, no run length ball outside off, no timing at all on that attempted slap, which trickles to extra cover
Starc to Rahul, no run slower ball, dug into the pitch on a hard length. Loses his shape on the cut and under-edges it on the bounce to the keeper
Starc to Rahul, FOUR runs that's just pure timing. Just a touch fuller outside off and he punches this over extra cover in the circle and to the boundary
Starc to Rahul, no run moving across but Starc is on target, not giving him any room and he can only pat it back down the pitch from a length
Starc to Rahul, no run clever bowling from Starc, slower bouncer well outside off. Rahul leaves it alone thinking it'll be a wide, but I think that was inside the tramline
Cummins to Hardik, no run length outside off, he's moving across and slashes this fiercely but can't beat extra cover

Cummins to Hardik, no run great bowling. He was moving across but the bowler still kept it wide outside off, and just inside the tramline. Pandya decides again reaching for it and potentially mis-hitting
Cummins to Hardik, 1 wide full toss, this one is just beyond the line of control, so to speak, and it's a wide
Cummins to Hardik, no run and this one doesn't bounce as much as Hardik thought. Moving across, covers the line well to pull this, but the ball goes under the bat

Cummins to Hardik, no run fuller and still wide of off. Pandya stays still that time and launches into a booming drive, but only connects with air. This is superb from Cummins to a big-hitter like Pandya who is in form

Cummins to Hardik, no run length well wide of off stump, moving across again, throws his bat at it to crash through offside but he hasn't nailed a single shot this over. This one takes the under edge and bounces to Carey

Cummins to Hardik, no run and that is a sensational end to the over by Cummins. Slips in a full toss that's dipping a tad, I don't think Pandya was expecting that at all, ends up beaten once again while trying to punch it. Reacted late to the full toss
Hazlewood to Rahul, 1 run full outside off, driven to deep cover
Hazlewood to Hardik, 2 runs fuller outside off, he's moving across again, manages to use wrists in a mini helicopter shot to long-on. Not really timed well
Hazlewood to Hardik, 1 run moves across again but this is also on a sixth stump line so ends up not having too much room. Swats it to long-on
Hazlewood to Rahul, no run full toss in the channel again. Rahul's turn to be surprised by that and miss connecting. Aimed a big drive at it

Hazlewood to Rahul, SIX runs nails it this time. Another full toss, Rahul backs away this time and flashes a powerful cover drive that travels flat and hard. Ashton Agar at the cover boundary dives to his right but the ball's too quick for him and actually goes all the way
Hazlewood to Rahul, no run length ball on leg stump, misses the flick. Was aiming to go over fine leg, but the ball bounces off pad to the keeper

Cummins to Hardik, 1 run yorker length outside off, he gets bat down horizontal to steer it. Flies to Zampa's right at short third man but he puts in a dive and gets a palm to it. can't really call it a drop
Cummins to Rahul, 1 run back of a length outside off, slashed to deep point

Cummins to Hardik, FOUR runs back of length on the stumps, Pandya doesn't try to hit it too hard this time, so even though he's not hit it very fluently, he's timed it well enough to find the deep square leg boundary with his pull
Cummins to Hardik, 1 run full outside off, gets low and drives to deep point

Cummins to Rahul, 1 run chipped in the air but not in Finch's reach at point. that seemed to really stick in the pitch, on a length outside off, he was too early into his cut, it ballooned off the upper edge. Finch opts to be safe rather than try a difficult catch with the game all but sewn up
Cummins to Hardik, 1 run length outside off, cuts to cover
Zampa to Hardik, 1 run flat and well wide of off, he chops it to deep extra cover
Zampa to Rahul, SIX runs down the track and clears long-off. Wasn't hit cleanly, but had enough on it to go just over the long arms of Mitchell Starc at long-off.

Zampa to Rahul, 2 runs dropped by Finch running backwards from point. Went down on his knee to crash this through the offside, gets a top edge that swirls over point. The wind wouldn't have made it easy as Finch running back can't even lay hand on it

Zampa to Rahul, OUT and he's finally caught. Hazlewood at short third man has a very easy take. After being nearly caught for two balls in a row, Rahul goes off the third, a routine top edge lobbing up to the fielder. Was swiping across the line again but this was nicely flighted and dipped, got
Zampa to Jadeja, 1 run flatter outside off but very full, so he sweeps it hard to deep square leg
Zampa to Hardik, 2 runs length on off, slaps it through cover
Cummins to Jadeja, FOUR runs short ball outside off, he goes deep and nails a pull shot that beats square leg to his left
Cummins to Jadeja, (no ball) 1 run goes deep in his crease again but can't get underneath this full ball and can only mis-time it to mid-off. Oh he's overstepped, so free hit coming up.
Cummins to Hardik, no run swing and a miss to the free hit. Excellent bowling by Cummins. Full ball and wide outside off. Pandya swings hard but connects only with air
Cummins to Hardik, 1 run fuller outside off, squeezed to cover. Not timed well
Cummins to Jadeja, 1 run length ball on the stumps, slower one, but Jadeja flicks it comfortably through square leg
Cummins to Hardik, 1 run fuller, punched to long-on
Cummins to Jadeja, 1 wide tried the wide yorker outside off but went too far across and it's a wide
Cummins to Jadeja, 2 runs back of a length on leg stump, slows it up again, Jadeja pats it towards square leg and they sprint two

Starc to Hardik, (no ball) holes out to deep midwicket. He had to go for the big hits, but Australia have strangled him. This was dug into the pitch back of a length and he was cramped for room, tried to pull. Couldn't control it. oh wait a minute, it's a no ball. He's overstepped. Pandya stay

Starc to Jadeja, SIX runs boom. This is the Jadeja who was in prime IPL hitting form. Full toss, low outside off, a yorker gone wrong. Those are not so easy to hit but Jadeja has the room to baseball slug it over midwicket. well over.
Starc to Jadeja, 2 runs back of a length and closer to off, doesn't time his pull but it's in a gap at midwicket so they get two

Starc to Jadeja, SIX runs bang goes Jadeja. Another yorker attempt, this one was outside off and not as wide, but Jadeja clears his front leg and smashes it way over square leg. Powerful strikes these
Starc to Jadeja, no run goes for the wide yorker outside off and gets away with one just about on the tramline. Jadeja is disappointed, he thought that should be a wide
Starc to Jadeja, 1 run another wide and full ball, he's more prepared for it this time and reaches out to stroke it, gets an inside edge that goes to short fine leg
Starc to Hardik, 2 runs backs away, Starc follows him but bowls a half volley instead of a yorker on the pads, and Pandya flicks it off his toes to deep midwicket.
Cummins to Shami, 1 wide hat-trick ball goes way down legside for a wide
Cummins to Shami, 1 run length outside off, negotiated towards point
Cummins to Saini, no run length ball, rears up towards the batsman while nipping into him, fended off awkwardly into the offside from near his midriff
Cummins to Saini, 1 wide bouncer goes over his head and it's been called a wide
Cummins to Saini, 1 run length on off, pushed through cover
Cummins to Shami, no run
Maxwell to Saini, 1 run fullish on the stumps, clipped to long-on
Maxwell to Shami, no run swing and a miss. Big swing. Length ball going across him outside off. He was looking to send it to downtown Sydney
Maxwell to Saini, no run length on middle and leg, tapped back
Maxwell to Saini, 1 run fuller, driven to long-off
Maxwell to Bumrah, no run length on the stumps, goes right back and defends
Zampa to Saini, no run length on the stumps, punched back to the bowler's right
Zampa to Saini, 1 run leg-break on a length, goes back and punches to long-on

Zampa to Bumrah, OUT googly, he didn't read it at all and trapped right in front. He was shaping to push into the offside with the ball pitching on off, but it spun back in. He's standing fairly deep too, and struck below the knee roll so it's as plumb as it gets. Crashing into middle stump
Zampa to Chahal, no run tossed up, he comes on the front foot and drives, inside half of the bat to midwicket
Zampa to Chahal, no run fuller, and he covers the line while tapping it to midwicket
Zampa to Chahal, 1 run attempted slog across the line, a top edge goes clear of midwicket
Maxwell to Chahal, 1 run flat on leg stump, moves across and clips it backward of square
Maxwell to Saini, FOUR runs tossed up on off, big stride out and smashes it coolly to the long-off boundary
Maxwell to Saini, 1 run flatter and fuller, drills it powerfully and very straight but Starc has moved straighter so it's only a single
Maxwell to Chahal, 1 run wider outside off, tries to slog it again, but it goes to cover off the toe-end
Maxwell to Saini, 1 run nice looking shot, goes on one knee and square drives it through cover point
Maxwell to Chahal, 1 run tossed up and he drives to long-on. Australia win by 51 runs
Better over-rates in this game incidentally. Australia are 16 minutes over time, India were 22. Much better than the first ODI.

10.46 pm Australia take the series with an unbeatable 2-0 lead. Two comprehensive wins, driven by their batting. Both times they put up totals that were just beyond what could be achieved. India's batting was solid enough but they had too much to chase. The bowling will cause some worries. Australia's
Australia won by 51 runs
Player of the match is Steven Smith, AUS
